StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Genetic Factors Underlying Varying Clinical Phenotypes of 3-Methylcrotonyl-CoA Carboxylase Deficiency (MCCD)

Person.Organization: SCRIPPS RESEARCH INSTITUTEUNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA SAN DIEGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap. Samples and associated genotype and phenotype data for this study, Genetic Factors Underlying Varying Clinical Phenotypes of 3-Methylcrotonyl-CoA Carboxylase Deficiency (MCCD), were provided by Kelly Frazer, Ph.D. and Bruce Barshop, M.D., Ph.D. This study was supported by NIH grant R03HD69983 and a grant of the Swiss National Science Foundation (MRB SNFS-3200AO-109219/1).
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
This project requires local IRB approval.
The progress report should cite work done that relates specifically to this dataset [Genetic Factors Underlying Varying Clinical Phenotypes of 3-Methylcrotonyl-CoA Carboxylase Deficiency (MCCD)] and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may have been requested at the same time.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (3-Methylcrotonyl-CoA Carboxylase Deficiency, IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MCCD-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to 3-Methylcrotonyl-CoA Carboxylase Deficiency. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
